1

[NEW YORK]368-new york CABBIES were a unique breed . Fearless to a fault , [they]261-they sped and swerved through [crowded streets]262-crowded streets with unnatural calm . To save [my]60-eva sanity , [I]60-eva ’d learned to focus on the screen of [my]60-eva smartphone instead of [the cars]263-the cars rushing by only inches away . Whenever [I]60-eva made the mistake of paying attention , [I]60-eva ’d find [my]60-eva right foot pushing hard into the floorboard , [my]60-eva body instinctively trying to hit the brakes .

But for once , [I]60-eva did n’t need any distractions . [I]60-eva was sticky with sweat from an intense Krav Maga class , and [my]60-eva mind was spinning with thoughts of what [the man [I]60-eva loved]264-the man i loved had done .

[Gideon Cross]612-gideon . Just thinking of [his]264-the man i loved name sent a heated flare of longing through [my]60-eva tightly strung body . From the moment [I]60-eva first saw [him]264-the man i loved — saw through [his]264-the man i loved stunning and impossibly gorgeous exterior to [the dark and dangerous man inside]265-the dark and dangerous man inside — [I’d]60-eva felt the pull that came from finding the other half of [myself]60-eva . [I]60-eva needed [him]264-the man i loved like [I]60-eva needed [my]60-eva heart to beat , and [he]264-the man i loved ’d put [himself]264-the man i loved in great jeopardy , risking everything — for [me]60-eva .

The blare of a horn snapped [me]60-eva back to the present .

Through the windshield , [I]60-eva saw [[my]60-eva roommate]266-my roommate ’s million - dollar smile flashing at [me]60-eva from the billboard on the side of [a bus]267-a bus . [Cary Taylor]1274-cary ’s lips had a come - hither curve and [his]1274-cary long , lean frame was blocking [the intersection]268-the intersection . Not a chance . [Cary]1274-cary was n’t moving and neither was I. [He]1274-cary lounged on [his]1274-cary side , bare - chested and barefooted , [his]1274-cary jeans unbuttoned to show both the waistband of [his]1274-cary underwear and the sleek lines of [his]1274-cary ripped abs . [His]1274-cary dark brown hair was sexily mussed and [his]1274-cary emerald eyes were bright with mischief .

[I]60-eva was suddenly struck with the knowledge that [I]60-eva would have to keep a dreadful secret from [[my]60-eva best friend]270-my best friend .

[Cary]1274-cary was [my]60-eva touchstone , [my]60-eva voice of reason , [my]60-eva favorite shoulder to lean on — and [a brother]271-a brother to [me]60-eva in every way that mattered . [I]60-eva hated the thought of having to hold back what [Gideon]612-gideon had done for [me]60-eva .

[I]60-eva wanted desperately to talk about it , to get help working it out in [my]60-eva head , but [I]60-eva ’d never be able to tell [anyone]272-anyone . Even [[our]273-our therapist]274-our therapist could be ethically and legally bound to break [our]273-our confidence .

[I]60-eva sat back , [my]60-eva arms around [my]60-eva waist , rocking .

15

16
